scripts.start-dev: chmod a+rx health/healthCheck.sh; export NODE_ENV=developer; node app.js
scripts.start-prod: chmod a+rx health/healthCheck.sh; export NODE_ENV=production; node app.js
scripts.zip: rm -rf ../../deployments/nava-backend && mkdir ../../deployments/nava-backend && rsync -av --progress ./ ../../deployments/nava-backend/ --exclude node_modules --exclude .git && cd ../../deployments/nava-backend && zip ../nava-backend.zip -r * .[^.]* && open .
